mapper.select: select a.*, b.name `goodsName`, b.list_pic_url as list_pic_url from nideshop_product a left join nideshop_goods b on a.goods_id = b.id where a.goods_id = #{goodId}

select nideshop_product.id, nideshop_product.goods_id goodsId, nideshop_product.goods_specification_ids goodsSpecificationIds, nideshop_product.goods_sn goodsSn, nideshop_product.goods_number goodsNumber, nideshop_product.retail_price retailPrice, nideshop_product.market_price marketPrice, nideshop_goods.name goods_name goodsName from nideshop_product LEFT JOIN nideshop_goods ON nideshop_product.goods_id = nideshop_goods.id WHERE 1=1 dto.goodsId
AND nideshop_product.goods_id = #{goodsId}
AND nideshop_goods.name LIKE concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
order by nideshop_product.id desc
